# Notations

* $n\in\N$ dimension of state-space $\mathcal{X}\subseteq\R^n$
* $m_1\in\N$ dimension of controllable input/output $u(t), y(t)$
* $m_2\in\N$ dimension of uncontrollable interaction coupling port $d(t), z(t)$
* $m = m_1 + m_2$ dimension of input/output $\tilde{u}(t), \tilde{y}(t)$ into system

# Abbreviations

* **pH** - port-Hamiltonian
* **pHDAE** - port-Hamiltonian descriptor system
